name: Tappy Copter
description:
Introducing Tappy Copter. The brand new, fast paced "Flappy Birds" style game brought to you by Winterweb.

Use your fast reaction times to dodge deadly ice rocks, and avoid crashing your helicopter whilst collecting stars. Be sure to share you highscores with us!

Tappy Copter is currently in BETA. This game is still not "complete" as such and bugs may be present.

v 1.2 ..... What's new?

  • Minor bug fixes
  • Replaced "Score:" with image
  • New game over text

We're currently working hard to introduce:

  • Save score feature
  • Other stars (silver, bronze)
  • Select the colour of your helicopter
  • + much more

Please be sure to share your ideas and suggestions with us, in the comments below, as we love hearing from you!

Controls:

TAP - to navigate your helicopter up or down
